Class SalsaAPIConnective

  • java.lang.Object
    • SalsaAPIConnective

  • public class SalsaAPIConnective
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Christine Bocionek An interface to use the Salsa Java API (http://www.coli.uni-saarland.de/projects/salsa/page.php?id=software) to parse a Salsa XML corpus. Uses the Salsa API classes listed below to parse the Salsa XML corpus.
    See Also:
    salsa.corpora.elements.CorpusParser, Corpus, Body, salsa.corpora.elements.Sentences, Sentence

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SalsaAPIConnective(java.lang.String file, SentenceList sentenceList)
      Parses a Salsa XML file which represents a corpus by: a) creating a Corpus object from said Salsa XML file, b) extracting this Corpus object's Body (Salsa XML file minus the header), c) extracting an ArrayList of all Sentences from the Body, d) iterating over all Sentences and extracting their Graphs, e) creating ConstituencyTrees for all Graphs, f) assigning a ConstituencyTree to the corresponding SentenceObj in the SentenceList.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Body getBody() 
      Corpus getCorpus() 
      java.util.LinkedList<Graph> getGraphs() 
      Head getHead() 
      CorpusParser getParser() 
      java.util.ArrayList<Sentence> getSentences() 
      java.util.LinkedList<ConstituencyTree> getTrees() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SalsaAPIConnective

        public SalsaAPIConnective(java.lang.String file,
                  SentenceList sentenceList)
        Parses a Salsa XML file which represents a corpus by: a) creating a Corpus object from said Salsa XML file, b) extracting this Corpus object's Body (Salsa XML file minus the header), c) extracting an ArrayList of all Sentences from the Body, d) iterating over all Sentences and extracting their Graphs, e) creating ConstituencyTrees for all Graphs, f) assigning a ConstituencyTree to the corresponding SentenceObj in the SentenceList.
        Parameters:
        file - A String of the path of the Salsa XML corpus.
        sentenceList - A SentenceList containing all sentences of the XML corpus as SentenceObj.

    • Method Detail

      • getHead

        public Head getHead()
        Returns:
        The Head of the Corpus, representing the 'head' section of a Salsa XML corpus.

      • getCorpus

        public Corpus getCorpus()
        Returns:
        The Corpus object representing the Salsa XML corpus.

      • getBody

        public Body getBody()
        Returns:
        The Body object representing the 'body' section of a Salsa XML corpus.

      • getSentences

        public java.util.ArrayList<Sentence> getSentences()
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all Sentence objects of the Salsa XML corpus.

      • getGraphs

        public java.util.LinkedList<Graph> getGraphs()
        Returns:
        A LinkedList of Graph objects which represent the tree structure of every sentence in the Salsa XML corpus.

      • getTrees

        public java.util.LinkedList<ConstituencyTree> getTrees()
        Returns:
        A LinkedList of ConstituencyTree objects which represent the tree structure of every sentence in the Salsa XML corpus and are created from the Graph objects of the Salsa Java API.

      • getParser

        public CorpusParser getParser()
        Returns:
        The CorpusParser object which parses the Salsa XML corpus.
